name: Bilbo Baggins
description: The titular character, a hobbit who is recruited by Gandalf and the dwarves to join their quest. He undergoes personal growth and transforms into a brave and resourceful adventurer.

name: Gandalf the Grey
description: A wise and powerful wizard who orchestrates the adventure and provides guidance to Bilbo and the dwarves. He plays a significant role in the events of both 'The Hobbit' and 'The Lord of the Rings.'

name: Thorin Oakenshield
description: The leader of the company of dwarves and the heir to the throne of the Lonely Mountain. Thorin is determined to reclaim his homeland and can be proud and stubborn at times.

name: Gollum
description: A tormented and riddle-loving creature Bilbo encounters deep within the Misty Mountains. Gollum possesses a mysterious ring that becomes a pivotal element in the story.

name: Smaug
description: The fearsome dragon who has taken over the dwarves' homeland, the Lonely Mountain. Smaug is a cunning and powerful adversary who guards a vast treasure hoard.
